results.title: The Worlds of Rudyard Kipling
results.brief_description: The film uses over 600 still photographs to present Kipling- the poet, novelist, patriot and chauvinist- and his love of America, India and South Africa. Narrated by Anthony Quayle.

results.title: The World tree: A scandinavian creation myth (K)_
results.brief_description: An art film which depicts the Scandinavian myth of Voluspa involving the opposing forces of fire and ice, the frost giant, the ice cows and the gods who created everything on Earth, including the world tree which formed a bridge between the gods and the universe they had created.

results.title: The World parade: America's wonderlands
results.brief_description: An American travelogue showing many of America’s famous national parks including the Rocky Mountains National Park and Yellowstone. Also features other areas of interest such as the magnificent Niagara Falls and the Yosemite Falls and glimpses of Colorado, Oregon, Utah, Arizona, California and New York.

results.title: The World of the molecule
results.brief_description: Nobel Prize winner Professor Hermann Staudinger speaks about macro molecules. In the age of mass consumption no branch of the chemical industry has experienced a boom such as that if the production of plastic.
